Options.Doc: If this filter is successful, add any arbitrary fields to this event.
Options.Name: AddField

Options.Doc: UDP port number to listen on
Options.Name: Port

Options.Doc:
If this filter is successful, add arbitrary tags to the event. Tags can be dynamic
and include parts of the event using the %{field} syntax.
Options.Name: Tags

Options.Doc: Add a type field to all events handled by this input
Options.Name: Type

Options.Doc:
The codec used for input data. Input codecs are a convenient method for decoding
your data before it enters the input, without needing a separate filter in your bitfan pipeline
Options.Name: Codec
